typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudSales',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudSalesCustomers
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudStreaming',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudStreamingCustomers
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'VanArsdel/dboCustomers',
	fileName: 'dboCustomers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> VanArsdelCustomer
CloudSalesCustomers, CloudStreamingCustomers union(byName: true)~> UnionSalesStreaming
UnionSouthridgeVanArsdel derive(CreatedDateShort = toDate(byName('CreatedDate')),
		UpdatedDateShort = toDate(byName('UpdatedDate'))) ~> FixDates
UnionSalesStreaming derive(SourceID = 1) ~> AddSourceId
VanArsdelCustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName = LastName,
		LastName = FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomer
SelectCustomer derive(SourceID = 2) ~> AddSourceId2
AddSourceId, AddSourceId2 union(byName: true)~> UnionSouthridgeVanArsdel
